Qualification

  • For Principal: Candidates should possess PG and B.Ed/M.A Education.
  • For PGT: Candidates should possess PG, (for PGT(Commerce): B.com, PG), Professional Qualification: B.Ed
  • For PGT (Vocational): Candidates should possess Degree, PG Diploma/ PG (Concerned Subject).
  • For CRT: Candidates should possess Degree, PG, B.Ed (Concerned Subject).
  • For PET: Candidates should possess Intermediate or any degree and U.G.D P.Ed or B.P.Ed/ M.P.Ed
  • For Warden: Candidates should possess Any degree and B.Ed/M.A Education.
  • For Part time teachers: Candidates should possess B.Sc Maths and B.Ed/M.A Education.
  • For Accountant: Candidates should possess B.Com/ B.Com (Computer) Degree.
  • For more Qualification Details Refer Notification.

Maharashtra.contentHtml:
Name of the Post: MPSC Maharashtra Agricultural Services 2024 Online Form 

Post Date: 30-12-2023

Latest Update: 27-09-2024

Total Vacancy: 524+258 = 782

Brief Information: Maharashtra Public Service Commission (MPSC) has given a Notification for Conducting of Maharashtra Gazetted Civil Services Common Preliminary Examination-2024. Those Candidates who are interested in the vacancy details & completed all eligibility criteria can read the Notification & Apply Online.

  Maharashtra Public Service Commission (MPSC)

Advt No. 414/2023

Maharashtra Gazetted Civil Services Common Preliminary Examination-2024

WWW.FREEJOBALERT.COM

Download Mobile App

Application Fee

  • For Open Category: Rs. 544/-
  • For Backward Classes/Economically Weaker Sections/Orphans/Disabled: Rs. 344/-
  • Payment Mode: Through Debit Card, Credit Card, Net Banking or Pay Offline through E-Challan.

 Important Dates

Dates for Maharashtra Agriculture Service Exam : 

  • Starting Date For Apply Online & Payment of Fee:  27-09-2024
  • Last Date For Apply Online & Payment: 17-10-2024 to 23:59 hrs
  • Date of taking copy of challan for Payment of Examination fee by Challan in SBI: 19-10-2024 up to 23:59 hrs
  • Last Date For Payment of Examination fee by Currency: 21-10-2024 During bank Office hours

Reopen Dates:

  • Starting Date For Apply Online & Payment of Fee: 31-05-2024 at 14:00 hrs
  • Last Date For Apply Online & Payment: 07-06-2024 to 23:59 hrs
  • Date of taking copy of challan for Payment of Examination fee by Challan in SBI: 09-06-2024 up to 23:59 hrs
  • Last Date For Payment of Examination fee by Currency: 10-06-2024 During bank Office hours
  • Revised Date of Maharashtra Gazetted Civil Services Joint Prelims Exam-2024: 21-07-2024 (Postponed)
  • New Date of Maharashtra Gazetted Civil Services Joint Prelims Exam-2024 : 25-08-2024 (Postponed)

Old Dates:

  • Starting Date For Apply Online & Payment of Fee: 05-01-2024 at 14:00 hrs
  • Last Date For Apply Online & Payment: 24-01-2024 to 23:59 hrs
  • Date of taking copy of challan for Payment of Examination fee by Challan in SBI: 25-01-2024 up to 23:59 hrs
  • Last Date For Payment of Examination fee by Currency: 28-01-2024 During bank Office hours
  • Date of Maharashtra Gazetted Civil Services Joint Prelims Exam-2024: 28-04-2024 (Postponed)
  • Date of State Service Main Examination-2024: 14 to 16-12-2024
  • Date of Maharashtra Architectural Engineering Service, Main Exam-2024: 23-11-2024
  • Date of Maharashtra Forest Service Main Exam-2024: 28 to 31-12-2024

Age Limit (as on 01-04-2024)

  • Minimum Age Limit: 18/19 Years
  • Maximum Age Limit: 38 Years
  • Age Relaxation is Applicable as per Rules.

Qualification

  • State Services Examination: CA/ICWA, Degree or Engineering Degree, PG
  • Civil Engineering Services Examination: Civil Engineering Degree.
  • Maharashtra Forest Service Examination: Degree or Engineering Degree
  • Maharashtra Agriculture Service Examination : Degree (Agricultural or Agricultural Engineering or Horticulture)
  • For More Information Regarding Qualification Details Refer Notification
Vacancy Details
Maharashtra Gazetted Civil Services Common Preliminary Examination-2024
Sl. No
 Dept. Name Cadre Total
1. General Administration Department State Services Group-A and Group-B 205
2. Department of Soil and Water Conservation Maharashtra Civil Engineering Services Group-A and Group-B 26
3. Revenue and Forest Department Maharashtra Forest Service, Group-A and Group-B 43
4. Maharashtra Agriculture Service Department of Agriculture Maharashtra Agricultural Service Exam 258

Name of the Post: AIIMS, Raipur Senior Resident (Non-Academic) 2024 Walk in

Post Date: 08-10-2024

Total Vacancy: 82

Brief Information: All India Institute of Medical Sciences (AIIMS), Raipur has published a Notification for the Recruitment of Senior Resident (Non Academic) Vacancy. Those Candidates who are interested in the vacancy details & completed all eligibility criteria can read the Notification & Attend.

     All India Institute of Medical Sciences (AIIMS), Raipur

Advt No. 03/02/2024/Recruit./Acad/AIIMSRPR/2058

 Senior Resident (Non-Academic) Vacancy 2024

WWW.FREEJOBALERT.COM

Download Mobile App

Application Fee

  • For General/ OBC/ EWS Categories: Rs. 1,000/- 
  • For Women/ SC/ ST/ PwBD/ Ex-Servicemen Categories: Nil
  • Payment Mode: Demand Draft/Banker’s Cheque

Important Dates

  • Date of Walk in Interview: 15-10-2024

Age Limit (as on 15-10-2024)

  • Upper Age Limit: 45 Years
  • Age Relaxation is Applicable As Per Rules.

Qualification

  • Candidates Should Possess PG Medical Degreeviz. MD/MS/DNB/Diploma in respective discipline
  • Candidates Should Possess DMC/DDC/MCI
